name: Kindred Creative Group
description:
We are Kindred—a brand innovation agency that launches and reinvents companies who are making positive impact.
Since 2009, we have been using our Brand Truth™ process to get to the heart of your brand so we can amplify what makes you truly awesome.
We use our creative and strategic smarts to make a difference.In your bottom line. In the world. In the number of heart emojis you get.
